display_long_description:
# Chill Out and Create
Cozy Worlds is a relaxing building game where you turn your space into a loveable landscape. Settle in on the couch or slip into VR and turn your home into a playful world you create. No combat or pressure, just chill vibes and creativity.

**Who doesn't like Pudu?**
[media]

# Why I Made this Demo (a message from the developer Richard)
I’m a developer who likes playful ideas, good vibes in games, and games you can enjoy while still being present with the people around you. I also enjoy building prototypes and playful experiements. So I built this demo to share with you. I’d love your feedback. 

[media]

# What to Expect in the Demo
This is an early prototype. I’m not totally sure what comes next, but I’ve got lots of ideas and I’m genuinely curious what you think. If it speaks to you, give it a go—and drop me a message on Discord, Reddit, or Bluesky.



# What Else?
I've got more prototypes I’d like to share. Sign up to this email list to get updates: 

https://www.vrtogether.us/unannounced-game-email-signups

Thanks!



[media]
